# California Cosmetologist License Requirements (2026)

## Board of Barbering and Cosmetology (BBC)

The Board of Barbering and Cosmetology (BBC), under the Department of Consumer Affairs, licenses cosmetologists in California.

### Training Requirements
- **Total Hours:** 1,000 hours at a BBC-approved school
- **Curriculum:** Hair styling, cutting, coloring, chemical treatments, skin care basics, nail care, sanitation
- **Note:** Hours reduced from 1,600 to 1,000 effective January 1, 2022 (SB 803)

### Eligibility
- Age: 17 years or older
- Education: 10th grade completion or equivalent
- Complete approved cosmetology program OR apprenticeship

### Examination
- **Format:** Written exam only (practical exam eliminated January 1, 2022)
- **Questions:** 100 scored questions + 10 pretest questions
- **Time:** 120 minutes
- **Passing Score:** 70% (70/100 correct)
- **Languages:** English, Korean, Spanish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese

### Fees (2025-2026)
| Fee Type | Amount |
|----------|--------|
| Application/Exam | $75 |
| Initial License | $50 |
| Biennial Renewal | $50 |
| Delinquent Renewal | +$25 |

### Official URLs
- BBC Main: https://www.barbercosmo.ca.gov
- License Requirements: https://www.barbercosmo.ca.gov/applicants/license_requirements.shtml
- BreEZe Online System: https://www.breeze.ca.gov
- Contact: (800) 952-5210

# California Cosmetologist Continuing Education & Renewal

## No Continuing Education Required

**Important:** California does NOT require continuing education (CE) credits for cosmetology license renewal. This is different from many other states.

### Renewal Process
- License valid for 2 years
- Renew online via BreEZe: https://www.breeze.ca.gov
- Renewal fee: $50
- Late renewal (within 5 years): $50 + $25 delinquency fee
- After 5 years: Must reapply and re-examine

### Processing Times (as of January 2026)
- Online applications: ~3 weeks
- Mail applications: ~8 weeks
- With fingerprinting: up to 12 weeks

### License Verification
Verify any California cosmetology license at:
https://search.dca.ca.gov/

### Official Contact
- Phone: (800) 952-5210
- Email: barbercosmo@dca.ca.gov
- Address: Board of Barbering and Cosmetology, PO Box 944226, Sacramento, CA 94244-2260
